code: import React from"react";function bubbleSort(array){var temp,i,j;var length=array.length;var animations=[];var flag=0;for(i=0;i<length-1;i++){for(j=0;j<length-(i+1);j++){animations.push(['c',j+1,j]);animations.push(['c',j+1,j]);if(array[j+1]<array[j]){animations.push(['s',j+1,j,array[j],array[j+1]]);animations.push(['s',j+1,j]);temp=array[j+1];array[j+1]=array[j];array[j]=temp;flag=1;}}if(flag===0){break;}}return[array,animations];}export default bubbleSort;
